structure.unit: ARTICLE II. RESTRICTION ON CERTAIN FISHING NETS

text.section:
Sec. 14A-11. Intent; construction.
It is the intent of this board to implement Section 370.08(1), Florida Statutes, without interfering with the State's general regulation of saltwater fisheries. This article is intended to be consistent with and in furtherance of Chapter 370, Florida Statutes, and should be liberally construed to carry out its purposes.
